channel.title: ReapScape [317] New Pics, Thread Updated, 2005 Remake
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/92/reapbanner.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b]Intro[/b][/size]
ReapScape is a source written by myself, David, for multiple reasons, mainly an interest in all things runescape, and also because I enjoy games in general. This is my second source ever and my third client. I am not going to bore anyone with a long intro or anything so lets start the topic.
[size=4][b]Recent Update[/b][/size]
Most recent Feature = Pest Control. Needs a lot of work, credits to who-ever made the interface. [img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/4634/pestcontrol.png[/img]
Because I'm a nice guy, and I know some people have poor internet connections (Silent CJ) I have posted links so you do not have to load the pictures all at once.
[size=4][b]General Information[/b][/size] ReapScape is a runescape private server based on riotscape (not PI). In my opinion this is my most favorite source ever because it is clean and in my opinion very easy to use. The server itself aims at not recreating old runescape exactly, but aims at something greater, the community aspect. This doesn't mean that the server will be anyless perfect (because I am a perfectionist), it just means that I most likely will not take the time to add (or attempt to add) every skill just like runescape.
[size=4][b]The Server[/b][/size] As said previously, the server is riotscape based, but it would be pretty much a leech if this wasn't changed (ofc). The first thing done with the server was to remove the python scripting system (sorry ryan, its not for me). Other changes, besides content, include server sided cache loading(not too sure if I like this), [s]an almost completely rewritten item system using containers (about 90 percent hyperion),[/s] (was pointless unless properly added, might go back to this later, mainly just loaded item data from grahams binary file, rather than a text file), had also started adding the hyperion update server, but the Jagcached (or however it is spelled) was released, so I might just use that.
[size=4][b]The Content[/b][/size] [/center]
[ul][li]constitutes a done feature.[/li][/ul] [o] is a feature that is partial. [] is a feature that is unadded.
[b] These will not all be added, this is just a list of every skill related feature I could think of in Runescape. Some might not be in the 377 cache, in which case they will not be added.[/b]
Agility
[*] Gnome Agility Course [*] Extended Gnome Course [*] Skullball [*] Agility Pyramid [*] Penguin Agility Course [*] Barbarian Outpost Course [*] Extended Barbarian Course [*] Brimhaven Agility Arena [*] Monkey Agility Course [*] Wilderness Agility Course [*] Werewolf Fetch Game [*] Yanille Agility Dungeon [*] Dorgesh-Kaan Agility Course
Cooking
[*] Cooking Fish [*] Cooking Pies/Pizza/Potato/Stew [*] Chef's Guild [*] Brewing
Crafting
[*] Pottery [*] Leather [*] Snakeskin Armor [*] Dragonhide Leather [*] Jewelry [*] Weaving [*] Glass Making [*] Battle Staffs
Farming
[*] Cleaning A Plot [*] Planting Seeds [*] Growing Crops [*] Watering Crops [*] Harvesting Crops [*] Making Compost
Firemaking
[*] Burning Logs [*] Lanterns and Torches [*] Barbarian Firemaking [*] Firelighters
Fishing
[*] All Catchable Fish [*] Fishing Guild [*] Fishing Trawler
Fletching
[*] Fletching Arrows [*] Fletching Bows [*] Fletching Crossbows [*] Fletching Darts
Herblore
[*] Cleaning Herbs [*] Making Unfinished Potions [*] Making Potions [*] Druidic Ritual
Magic
[*] Magic on Items [*] Teleporting [*] Modern Spells [*] Ancient Magicks [*] Lunar Magic
Mining
[*] Pickaxes [*] Rocks and Ores [*] Rock Respawn Times [*] Mining Guild
Runecrafting
[*] Locating Altars using Talismans [*] Tiaras [*] Crafting Runes [*] Combination Runes [*] Abyssal Runecrafting
Thieving
[*] Pickpocketing Npc's [*] Looting Stalls [*] Unlocking Doors [*] Unlocking Chests [*] Disarming Traps [*] Rogue's Den Minigame [*] Pyramid Plunder Minigame
Woodcutting
[*] Axes [*] Trees [*] Canoes [*] Bird Nests
[center] [size=4][b]Media[/b][/size]
[size=3][b]Crafting[/b][/size] crafting (leather and d'hide) [img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/8990/craftingnew.png[/img] crafting (gems) [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/4916/gemcraftingnew.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Firemaking[/b][/size] [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/2657/firemakingnew.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Fishing[/b][/size] [img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/2165/fishingnew.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Fletching[/b][/size] [img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/4738/fletchingnew.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Mining[/b][/size] [img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/8981/miningnew.png[/img]
[size=3][b]RuneCrafting - no pouches / abyss[/b][/size] [b]I have not updated the runecrafting pics yet[/b] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/5977/rc1j.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Thieving[/b][/size] thieving (pickpocketing) 100 % [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/2609/thievingnew.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Woodcutting[/b][/size] [img]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/7179/woodcuttingnew.png[/img]
[/center]

Nexus_:

Really, really sexy. Seriously.

thanks man, aiming for an old rs replica. I feel like i have to play it one more time before I can move on from Runescape.

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:25, topic:350472”]Oh lawd, I haz a bonar rite nao.

Good work David ;).[/quote]
thanks man, content is epic atm, need to find a more efficient / easier way to mass add shops.

item.title: ReapScape [317] New Pics, Thread Updated, 2005 Remake
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Pure Demons, post:20, topic:350472”][quote author=Nexus_ link=topic=446835.msg3292207#msg3292207 date=1280694957]

Cool name.

Lmfao that was a shmart powst.

He said Cool name cause it has part of his name in it.

Thanks Sherlock Holmes. :rolleyes:
[/quote]

Aren’t I the detective. :P[/quote]
going to reply to all these at once. lol.

morterdestroyer:

im liked how u used the snapple moto haha:P

thanks, was trying to think of a server slogan and that commercial came on tv, thought it was fitting.
more pictures either tonight or tomorrow, ive had a feature overload.

Jonnydpickle:

How much longer for beta

well pre-alpha testing is somewhat going on at the moment, I have all the features I want added (full skills, etc) just need to make the server have an easy feel for the average player, i.e easily accessed skilling, mining, etc.

Read full topic

want to buy my vps for this? im selling cheap…

specs? i might buy, my current host is a 512 mb ram windows dedicated server, and its not as much as i want.
